Method Detail

request

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,?> request(java.lang.String event,
                                                 long uploaded,
                                                 long downloaded,
                                                 long left)
Generate a request to a tracker. Returns a map corresponding to the tracker's response. Call with event as null or equal to "" to get periodic updates on available peers. uploaded and downloaded are ignored when event is equal to "started".

Parameters:
event -
uploaded -
downloaded -
left -
